name: CiAction
desc: The data structure that represents an Actions resource.

items.name: buildDistributionAudience
items.desc: A type that indicates whether a build’s artifact is eligible for release on the App Store.

items.name: destination
items.desc: A string that describes the destination Xcode Cloud uses for an action.

items.name: isRequiredToPass
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the action must succeed in order for a build to succeed.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of the action; for example, archive or test.

items.name: platform
items.desc: The platform Xcode Cloud uses for the action.

items.name: scheme
items.desc: The name of the scheme that Xcode Cloud uses to perform the action.

items.name: testConfiguration
items.desc: An action’s test configuration. Only set this field for test actions.
